ISSUE.TITLE: Microdata is incorrectly set to OutOfStock
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Product is available and has Track Inventory and could be purchased but Display availability is not checked. The microdata for the product is incorrectly set to OutofStock: `<meta itemprop="availability" content="http://schema.org/OutOfStock"/>` Simply uncheck "Display availability" for any product that is available and you will replicate the issue. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/88443/nopcommerce-430-microdata-is-incorrectly-set-to-outofstock See also: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/4616
